summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Access page at /access. All requirements verified: page loads correctly, displays proper title and framing statement, includes Appropriate Contexts section, form has all 4 required fields (Name, Role/Capacity, Context, Why BACKGRND), form submission works with POST /api/access-requests, confirmation message displays correctly, no calendar elements, no promises of response, no friendly conversion language, and maintains calm firm tone throughout.
passed_tests: Framing statement about selective engagement present
Appropriate Contexts section present and properly labeled
Form contains all 4 required fields: Name, Role/Capacity, Context, Why BACKGRND
All form fields are interactive and accept input
Backend API returns proper response with id and received=true
Confirmation message maintains firm tone without promises
No calendar or scheduling elements found
No promises of response language found
Calm, firm tone maintained throughout (5 firm tone indicators found)
Backend access-requests endpoint stores data correctly in MongoDB
